wikipedia_page.main: M. Frederick "Fred" Spiller (22 November 1884 – 14 September 1953) was a British lightweight boxer who competed in the early 20th century.He won a silver medal in boxing at the 1908 Summer Olympics after losing the final of the lightweight competition against Frederick Grace. After losing to Frederick Grace he continued to pursue boxing until this unfortunate death 14 September 1953.

Herbert Henry "Harry" Johnson (10 August 1887 – 16 December 1947) was a British lightweight professional boxer who competed in the early twentieth century. He won a bronze medal in Boxing at the 1908 Summer Olympics losing against Frederick Spiller in the semi-finals.
